data.text: Mafalisayo na wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wayagwe wezile kulawa Yelusalemu waiting'hana haulongozi wa Yesu.
Wawona wanahina wayagwe wa Yesu oja bila kusunha makono gao kamba viilondigwa wanhu watende.
Mafalisayo na Wayahudi wayagwe okweleleza mafundizo gawabokele kwa wahenga zao, hawaja kinhu mbaka wasunhe makono gao ng'hani.
Wala hawaja kinhu chochose kulawa kudigulilo mbaka wasunhe, na okweleleza mafundizo gayagwe mengi kamba vija mwiko wa kusunha vikasi na nongo na viya va shaba na gayagwe mengi.
Avo Mafalisayo na Wafundiza Malagizo ga Musa wamuuza Yesu, “Habali wanahina zako hawakweleleza mafundizo gatugoleligwe na wahenga zetu, lakini oja bila kusunha makono?”
Yesu kawedika, “Mweye mwa watapitapi! Kumbe mtula ndagu wa Imulungu Isaya kalagula goya mbuli zenu viyandike,
Awo onitambikila bule,
“Mweye mogaleka Malagizo ga Imulungu na mogagoga mafundizo ga wanhu.”
Yesu kagendelela kulonga, “Mweye mwa wabala kwa kulema Malagizo ga Imulungu na kugagoga mafundizo genu wenyego.
Kwavija Musa kawalagiza, ‘Mtegeleze tatako na mamako,’ ‘Munhu yoyose yonda yamulige tatake hebu mamake kolondigwa yakomigwe.’
Lakini mweye mofundiza, kamba munhu kana kinhu kodaha kumtaza tatake hebu mamake lakini kolonga ‘Ino kobani’ fambulo jake kinhu kino nimulavila Imulungu,
munhu ayo halondigwa kumtaza tatake hebu mamake.
Kwa nzila ino mafundizo genu gomuwagwaa wanhu gosegesa mbuli za Imulungu. Na gayagwe mengi kamba gano gomutenda.”
Abaho Yesu kalukema lunhu lwa wanhu kabili na kalulongela, “Mweye mose mnitegeleze na mujuwe.
Kuduhu kinhu kingila mmulomo wa munhu kulawa kunze kidaha kumfitiza munhu. Lakini, kija kilawa mmulomo wa munhu acho kimfitiza munhu.”
Munhu yeli na magwiti yahulike.
Yesu na wanahina zake, viwalulekile lunhu lwa wanhu na kwingila mng'anda, wanahina zake wamuuza yawalongele fambulo da ulonzi uja.
Yesu kawalongela, “Vino mweye mwabule nzewele kubanza wanhu wayagwe? Vino hamujuwile kamba kuduhu kinhu kingila mmulomo wa munhu kulawa kunze kidaha kumfitiza munhu?
Kwavija hakingila muumoyo lakini mna iinda na abaho cholawa kunze ya lukuli.” Kwa ulonzi uno Yesu kavitenda vinhu vose va kuja vinoge kudigwa.
Kagendelela kulonga, “Kinhu kilawa muumoyo wa munhu acho kimfitiza munhu.
Kwavija muumoyo wa munhu golawa magesa gehile na kuiwasa chaka chaka na ubavi na ukomaji,
na ugoni na umelo na gehile na uvizi na kusulukila na migongo na maligo na kuitapa na ubozi.
Ago gose gehile golawa mgati mwa munhu na kumfitiza munhu.”
Abaho Yesu kahalawa hanhu aho kachola mwiimbaka ili behi na buga da Tilo. Kengila mng'anda na halondile munhu yoyose yajuwe kakala aho, lakini hadahile bule kuifisa.
Mtwanzi imoja, yakalile na mndele wake yeli na kinyamkela, viyahulike mbuli za Yesu, bahaja kamgendela na kamfugamila Yesu.
Mtwanzi ayo hakalile Muyahudi, kavumbuka kudibuga da Silofoinike mwiisi ya Siliya kampula Yesu yamulave mndele wake kinyamkela.
Lakini Yesu kamwidika, “Tanhu waleke wana wegute. Kwavija havinogile bule kusola ndiya ya iwana na kuwapigisila umbwa.”
Mtwanzi ayo kamwidika, “Ona, go mkulu, lakini hata umbwa weli hasi mmeza oja kija kisigazigwe na iwana!”
Yesu kamulongela mtwanzi ayo, “Kwavija kwidika vivo, bwela ukae kumwako na komvika mndele wako kinyamkela kamulawa!”
Mtwanzi ayo kachola ukae kumwake, viyavikile kamvika mndele wake katambalala mulusazi na kinyamkela kakala yamulawile.
Yesu kasegela kachola behi na isi ya Tilo kwa kubitila mwiisi ya Sidoni mbaka kudilamba da Galilaya kwa kubitila nzila ya mna zimbaka za Dekapoli.
Wanhu wayagwe wamgalila munhu yakalile hahulika na halonga, wampula Yesu yamwikile makono.
Yesu kamsola kamgala hamgwazo hanhu kuduhu wanhu. Yesu kengiza vidole mna gamagwitwi ga munhu ayo, katema mate kamkwasa lulimi.
Abaho Yesu kalola kuulanga, kabweza mhumuzi, kamulongela, “Efata!” fambulo jake, “Vuguka!”
Bahaja munhu ayo magwiti gake gavuguka na kakala yohulika na kulonga bila kugaya.
Abaho Yesu kawagomesa wanhu awo sikuwamulongele munhu yoyose mbuli ayo, lakini Yesu viyagendelele kuwagomesa, vivo viwagendelele kuibwililisa mbuli ayo.
Wanhu wose waihulike mbuli ayo wakanganya. Walonga, “Katenda goya kila kinhu, kowatenda wanhu hawahulika wahulike na wanhu hawalonga walonge!”
